Steps.Message: Update at 18:57 - Our customer support vehicle is now on site. It's located opposite 218 Slade Green Road and is ready to provide extra support to anyone affected by the power cut. Due to the current pandemic, we would normally door knock but we cannot do this at present. We ask that you observe the Government's social distancing advice when accessing this service. If you have someone in your property or know of someone who needs extra care, or cannot travel to the vehicle; please let us know by calling 08003163105 or tweet us @UKPowerNetworks.

We became aware of a power cut at 12:24. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 18:57 - Our customer support vehicle is now on site. It's located opposite 218 Slade Green Road and is ready to provide extra support to anyone affected by the power cut. Due to the current pandemic, we would normally door knock but we cannot do this at present. We ask that you observe the Government's social distancing advice when accessing this service. If you have someone in your property or know of someone who needs extra care, or cannot travel to the vehicle; please let us know by calling 08003163105 or tweet us @UKPowerNetworks.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
